localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Sherlock is a free Chrome plugin that analyzes price trends, permit history, sale history, demographics, quality of life, healthcare access, and more for every home on sale on Zillow and Redfin.
blogPost.body: Sherlock is a free Chrome plugin that analyzes price trends, permit history, sale history, demographics, quality of life, healthcare access, and more for every home on sale on Zillow and Redfin.
blogPost.title: Sherlock by ZeroDown - Instant real estate insight
blogPost.author: Hariharan Joghee Chandran

localize.description: Sherlock是一款免费的Chrome插件，它可以分析Zillow和Redfin上每一栋在售房屋的价格趋势、许可历史、销售历史、人口统计、生活质量、医疗服务等。
Sherlock是一款免費的Chrome插件，它可以分析Zillow和Redfin上每一棟在售房屋的價格趨勢、許可歷史、銷售歷史、人口統計、生活質量、醫療服務等。

previous.title:
At $7.72 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.55 trillion since the beginning of 2020 and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month going forward. https://t.co/MMvWqU9Nne

localize.full_text:
7.72万亿美元，美联储资产负债表本周再创新高。

自2020年初以来，美联储的总资产增加了3.55万亿美元，他们承诺未来将以每月1200亿美元的速度继续购买债券。https://t.co/MMvWqU9Nne。

7.72萬億美元，美聯儲資產負債表本週再創新高。

自2020年初以來，美聯儲的總資產增加了3.55萬億美元，他們承諾未來將以每月1200億美元的速度繼續購買債券。https://t.co/MMvWqU9Nne。

next.excerpt: Stike allows you to use your Debit Card, Credit Card or Bank account to instantly send and receive funds with 0 fees using the Bitcoin Lightning network to transmit payments. Users can also send to regular Bitcoin addresses as well.
next.title: Strike - Send money instantly, with no fees, anywhere in the world
